Package Tanks

Class SoundEffects

  • java.lang.Object
    • Tanks.SoundEffects
  • public class SoundEffects
extends java.lang.Object
    Allows the use of soundeffects in the game.

    • Constructor Summary

      Constructors 
      Constructor Description
      SoundEffects​(processing.core.PApplet parent, ddf.minim.Minim minim)
      Constructs a SoundEffects object.

    • Method Summary

      All Methods Instance Methods Concrete Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method Description
      void playExplosionSound()
      Plays the explosion sound effect.
      void playGameOverSound()
      Plays the game over sound effect.
      void playNextLevelSound()
      Plays the next level sound effect.
      void playPopSound()
      Plays the pop sound effect.
      void playTankMoveSound()
      Plays the tank movement sound effect.
      void playTurretSound()
      Plays the turret movement sound effect.
      void stopTankMoveSound()
      Stops the tank movement sound effect.
